DOC.brief_summary: TJ-100, a Japanese herbal medicine, is clinically effective in postoperative ileus. So it may activate bowel movement. This study will test the efficacy and safety of TJ-100 in the treatment of patients with chronic constipation.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of TJ-100 in the Treatment of Chronic Constipation
DOC.criteria: chronic constipation defined as less than 3 spontaneous bowel movement frequencies per week had symptoms of abdominal bloating or discomfort mechanical bowel obstruction clinically systemic diseaseinduced constipation pregnancy
